name: top_grossing_games
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool store_apps.
Tool description: Extremely Comprehensive API to search and list apps/games top charts on the Google Play Apps Store, including extensive app details and reviews in real-time.
API description: Fetches the top-grossing games chart from the Google Play Store, with support for filtering by category, language, and region.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Allowed values are between 1 and 200. Default is 50. Note that requests with a limit value between 101-200 will be charged double (2 requests).

language.description:
The language to use, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

category.description: The specific Google Play category to filter the chart by (e.g., 'GAME_RACING'). Default is None.

region.description:
The country code of country/region to use, specified as a 2-letter country code - see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default**: `us`.
